name: Annette Smith Bentley
text: I recommend these guys to anyone. They have worked around my work schedule many times just to make sure that every problem is addressed and that I would be safe in my travels. So with that being said give these guys a try

name: kenneth mote jr
text: Excellent service, super people to do business with!!   This is the only place I carry my  vehicles.   I highly recommend!!

name: Jason Bentley
text: First Class Service All Around!!! Recommend these guys to anyone!

name: David Robenstine
text: Russell and the staff are very knowledgeable.  Prices are reasonable.  I will be giving them more business in the future They do the job right the first time

name: Ben Martin
text: Randy and his crew always do really great work, at a very reasonable price. I always recommend them for repairs both big and small, and based on the stuff they always have sitting around, I am convinced they can fix anything.

name: Brittany LelaFaye Mote
text: These guys will definitely fix you up! They are amazing at what they do and they have the beat prices around.

name: Evan Alden
text: Great place, wonderful staff, good quality work and prices are the best around. They do all my work.

name: Jason Crow
text: I took my truck to these people and and there not mechanics they just change parts til they find the one it is what I call a part changer

resp.text:
Thank you for the review Jason. I am sorry that we were unable to satisfy your needs. Maybe you should have had us diagnose the problem before you told us to change parts.

We appreciate your business and am sorry that you had such unrealistic demands.
Have a wonderful day.

name: Bruce Weaver
text: Great people and service. They took control of my project and exceeded my expectations. The priice was right what I had calculated it would be as well. Great Job!!!

name: adam ledbetter
text: Great service. I highly recommend them for all your welding needs. Stainless steel, aluminum, mild steel and everything in between. Great repairs and fab work from scratch.they can even cut custom jobs on the water plasma table.

name: ken hollis
text:
I had a very good experience at Valley Repair Service on 7-2-2019. We had a lawn tractor wheel and hinge break off a cutting deck. I called this service and spoke with Ken the shop foreman and he told me they could make the repair. I drove to the shop with trailer and mower in tow. Ken welded the wheel hinge back onto the cutting deck within minutes! Great service and very nice welding work!
Thank you to Ken and Valley Repair Service!
